summary: The module implements a transformer-based neural network suite for processing 3D point clouds, including blocks for feature extraction, models for object classification and per-point segmentation, and a specialized loss for part segmentation.
business_intent: Enable developers to apply state-of-the-art deep learning techniques to 3D point cloud data for tasks such as object recognition and detailed part-level segmentation, supporting applications in autonomous navigation, robotics, and 3D scene analysis.
